description: A document representing a collection of media assets and their tags
title: Media Scene

___name.description: human readable name to refer to the scene by

___scene.description: a collection of objects representing the various assets of a scene

___text.description: Text to display for text media asset.

___type.description: Kind of media it is (only 'image', 'text', 'video', and 'audio' is supported)

___url.description: Url pointing to media asset if neccessary. Used for images, video, and audio.

___tags.description: Semantic tags for this asset, comma seperated

___displayDuration.description: How many seconds atemporal assets should be on the screen for

___maximumOnScreen.description: maximum counts of media types allowed on the screen at one time

___displayInterval.description: How many seconds should be between the showing of assets on the screen

___themes.description: represents sets of tags bundled together to make a coherent theme. Each property represents a singular theme.

additionalProperties.description: Comma seperated list of tags that belong to this theme.

___transitionDuration.description: How many seconds it should take for an asset to appear/disappear from the screen
